attributes.action: take a tougher stand against aggressive beggars and anti-social youths
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although aggressive begging is illegal and the government claims to be getting tough on anti-social behaviour, it is still impossible to walk through many city centres without being run down by millions of 12 year old cyclists decked head to toe in adidas at half ten at night.  Even if these are avoided, one can guarantee being approached by aggressive junkies who chant their usual mantra "'scuse me...any spare change", to which if you refuse, you are either threatened or shouted at, or followed to a cash machine.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
